data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 26151, Version Hash: 7703492d8438d217c4f7a907b2e7e33bf6137d95
data.actual_result: The nickname window disappears off Discord and gets stuck on the ROBLOX window instead.
data.expected_result: The nickname window should disappear after you click the screen.
data.short_description: The nickname window gets stuck on a ROBLOX window after trying to close it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a ROBLOX game - Go into any Discord server and change nickname - Put in any nickname that will exceed 32 characters/ max limit. - Hit Enter - After you see the error saying the nickname is too long click anywhere on the screen. - The nickname window disappears off Discord and is now stuck on ROBLOX.
